General.Name: Windfall Geotek Inc
General.Description: Windfall Geotek Inc. develops platforms for the mining sector. The company offers computer aided resource detection system, a platform to analyze geological data to identify and discover mineral deposits. It also acquires, explores for, and develops mineral resource properties in Québec. In addition, the company has an option agreement to hold 90% undivided interest in the Chapais project located in Quebec; and 95% undivided interest in the Corallen Lake property. Further, it has an option agreement to hold 100% interest in the Ashuanipi property located in Quebec, as well as holds interest in Marshall Lake project located in West area, Ontario. The company owns 5,945 claims in the province of Ontario; 1,193 claims in the province of Quebec; and 5 claims in the province of New Brunswick. The company was formerly known as Albert Mining Inc. and changed its name to Windfall Geotek Inc. in October 2019. Windfall Geotek Inc. was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Brossard, Canada.
General.Address: 7005 Taschereau Boulevard, Brossard, QC, Canada, J4Z 1A7
